    • Highlights

    • Delhi offers a mix of modernity and history with sites like India Gate, Red Fort, Qutub Minar, and Lotus Temple.
    • Agra is home to the magnificent Taj Mahal, a symbol of love and one of the Seven Wonders of the World.
    • Fatehpur Sikri, a historic Mughal city near Agra, showcases impressive architecture and cultural significance.
    • Jaipur, the Pink City, captivates with its forts, palaces, and vibrant bazaars, including Amber Fort and Hawa Mahal.
    • The tour provides a journey through Indian history, Mughal architecture, and Rajasthan's royal heritage.

    Phenomenal Delhi Tour - 4 Nights / 5 Days

    Day 1: Arrival in Delhi

    • Arrive in Delhi and transfer to the hotel.
    • Relax or explore nearby locations.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Delhi.

    Day 2: Delhi Historical Tour

    • Visit historical landmarks: India Gate, Red Fort, Qutub Minar, and Humayun’s Tomb.
    • Enjoy the vibrant atmosphere of Connaught Place and Chandni Chowk markets.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Delhi.

    Day 3: Delhi City Exploration

    • Explore modern landmarks: Lotus Temple and Akshardham Temple.
    • Leisure time to explore Delhi's cafes and shopping centers.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Delhi.

    Day 4: Local Markets and Cultural Insights

    • Visit Dilli Haat and Hauz Khas Village for shopping and cultural exploration.
    • Optional: Attend a cultural show or performance in the evening.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Delhi.

    Day 5: Departure from Delhi

    • After breakfast, transfer to Delhi airport for onward journey.
    • End of the Phenomenal Delhi Tour.
